reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ORDER THEM!! They SMELL AMAZING!!! They are the perfect size and the quality is great.
reviews.reviewText: ORDER THEM!! They SMELL AMAZING!!! They are the perfect size and the quality is great. I like how they come two in each pack so I don’t have to worry about them drying out. Each pack inside comes with two refills that each have a tab to pull up so you can just use the refill pack and seal the tab back down if needed. My toddler LOVES these!! They are very good. Definitely BUY!!! Also look for the refill pack holder, separate purchase, its so CUTE to use these with and it came with stickers!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and wonderful
reviews.reviewText: I can’t stand perfumes. These have a very slight smell and do not bother my allergies.This is better packaged. Ones I bought at the site were so full the first few are always waisted by the kids.Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good way to potty train, also nice for adults.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to help teach my daughter to wipe herself. So far these are the best wipes I've found because a lot of the other ones are very small, these aren't huge but big enough that she folds them length wise and it's good enough. Another very nice thing is these wipes pull out of the package like they should. Almost all the other wipes I tried would pull out 1 wipe and the 2nd wouldn't come with it so you would have to dig around in the package for the edge and that was frustrating for my young daughter trying to wipe by herself so I was very happy to see these worked great. I also bought the OXO wipe dispenser so they don't dry out and it's works very nicely. I'm sure there's a lot of other dispensers that would do the same thing but I would suggest getting one to keep these in or they can dry out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: I miss the Scott tissue brand of flushable wipes. I can literally see the tissue disentegratw once it’s thrown in the toilet. Unfortunatley they are discontinued.After research, I decided this was the next best thing. It’s non-scented, durable and thick enough. My only concern is if it truly disintegrates eventually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these wipes
reviews.reviewText: I am grateful for these wipes! It saves me alot of time and toilet tissue. It is great for potty training since its flushable and it is nice and soft for multiple uses. The only thing I dislike is that I usually need to use 2 at a time because one is way too thin especially for anything more than urine..lol. Otherwise...it is a good prduct.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is all my son uses.
reviews.reviewText: These are great for kids. They're flushable and the only thing my son uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work great and at a great value
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year old son used these while potty training and we continue to use these on a daily basis. I love buying these in bulk and they’re a staple in our home for our two children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Cleaned us up well and smelled like a melon after! Good thickness, soft, and flushed easily. Nice soft, clean, melon scent too.
I have been buying these wipes for years. I have tried others but I always come back to these. I wish they were no scent but the watermelon scent isn't displeasing.
